SYSTEM: AnaIglesiasMolina-MBC_TFM.pdf: Página 29
UPM / Japan collaboration
Results
29
Ontology-based data access technology applied to Bio2RDF
§
Just the datasets with data published as CSV have a size of more 
than 20 GB
§
Two bottlenecks:
1.
Creation of the database
2.
Querying the database
§
Databases can be created one by one. Then it becomes 
necessary a federator to query all the resulting databases
Big data
